name: Camtasia Dynamic Background
summary: A TSCSHADERVID file contains a dynamic background used by TechSmith Camtasia, a screen recording and video editing application. It stores plain text settings that make up the appearance and movement of the background that Camtasia users add to videos to enhance them. Users primarily open TSCSHADERVID files in Camtasia but may also open them with a text editor to view their contents.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
